text: (Napiyē!) Nayavañcakarkaḷum, uḷḷattil (pāva) nōyuḷḷavarkaḷum, matīṉāvil poyp piraccāram ceykiṟavarkaḷum (iṉiyum taṅkaḷ viṣamattiliruntu) vilakikkoḷḷāviṭil niccayamāka nām um'maiyē avarkaḷ mītu ēviviṭṭu viṭuvōm. Piṉṉar, atil umakku arukil veku coṟpa nāḷkaḷē tavira avarkaḷ vacittirukka muṭiyātu
